document.full_text: carmelo anthony scored 36 points, his most as a knick, but it was not enough to help the knicks climb out of a big early hole.
document.title: bobcats 114, knicks 106: anthony's high point can't raise the knicks
lines_and_colors: carmelo anthony scored 36 points, his most as a knick, but it was not enough to help the knicks climb out of a big early hole.
